_readme: This file serves as a template for user-specific data structure. On first load, if localStorage is empty, the app will initialize with default values. User actions (profile edits, saved jobs, applications) are stored in localStorage and override these defaults.

_instructions.dataFlow: JSON defaults → localStorage (on first use) → LocalStorage always wins on subsequent loads
_instructions.conflictResolution: LocalStorage data takes priority over JSON defaults
edgeCases: First-time user: Load from profile.json, save to localStorage
Corrupted localStorage: Fallback to JSON defaults
Storage quota exceeded: Clear old data, notify user

savedJobs._description: Jobs saved by the user. Each save action adds to localStorage.

applications._description: Job applications submitted by the user. Each application is timestamped.

_example.coverLetter: I am interested in this position...

searchHistory._description: Recent job searches. Limited to 10 most recent.

profileModifications._description: Tracks when user has modified their profile from the default template
